ygData.subject: RE: A Request and Thoughts on Rubicite Armor.
ygData.msgSnippet: You go on and rant about the worthless threads that have no interest to you and complain they are not bard specific and then post about problems with Rubicite
ygData.messageBody:
You go on and rant about the worthless threads that have no interest to you
and complain they are not bard specific and then post about problems with
Rubicite Armor? I agree with your early statements about the threads not
relating to bards, but that also includes Rubicite Armor. That is not a
bard topic. The only way it would be is if that was the only plate armor
that a bard could wear, which is not the case. So please do as you ask and
keep it about bards ;) Not a flame.

> ----------
>
> On topic discussion is appreciated. And please, keep it about bards.
>
> Pistov Shostakovich
> Bard of the 25th Song
> The Erudin Arcanium
> Cazic - Thule
> marcallie@...
>
>
>
